person.persName: James Speed Pirtle (Louisville Banker and Attorney.)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, banker and attorney. Louisville native. Son of Henry Pirtle and Jane Anne Pirtle. Married to Emily Bartley Pirtle. Father of Robert T. Pirtle, Jane Pirtle, William B. Pirtle, and Emily Pirtle. Graduated Louisville Male High School and University of Louisville Law School. Practiced in partnership with George W. Caruth. Unsuccessfully ran for a legislative seat on the Democratic ticket in 1865.
